name: Super Swinging King Chimp’s Jungle Monkey Jump
name_original: Super Swinging King Chimp’s Jungle Monkey Jump
description:
Hey! Go Bananas! Jump, leap and boing your way through 5 exotic locations and collect Monkey’s yummy fruit along the way. Get ready to really ape around with the cheekiest little Monkey yet in this fun and addictive Jump Game.

Bounce from giant coconuts and dash your way through 25 unique levels including jungle, desert, arctic, seaside and a special secret location. Hop aboard the waiting planes dotted around your locations and fire little Monkey from cannons to speed his journey. If you fancy a real challenge, endless mode let’s you play against the world with in-game and online achievements.

Fun Features

- 5 Awesome Locations, Jungle, Desert, Arctic, Seaside and a Secret Location
- 25 Levels of super addictive one tap game play
- Game Center Leaderboard Achievements
- Collect Coins, fly planes and fire Cannons
- Inspiring, fun busting in-game music
- Endless Mode for Monkeys who just wanna bounce as far as they can!
